resources.string: Sandy
Home
Dashboard
Notifications
Hello, my name is Sandy. Before we chow down together, I have to get to know you. Touch my buns to proceed
tutorial_key

string-array.name: tutorial_questions
string-array.item: Okay smartie, is this a sandwich?
I don\'t care if you think you could fit this in your mouth\; is it a sandwich?
Sandwich, or not sandwich? That is the question.

resources.string: Picture
Info
This sample needs camera permission.
This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
This is an intro message I\'ve included because they voices told me to.
Watch where you put that finger. I said touch my buns.
I know who you are and I\'ve seen where you sleep. Do not lie to me again.
Some people just don\'t appreciate the Chip Butty. Deleting
That was an ice cream SANDWICH, but I\'ll respect your prejudice - deleting
Yes, it does appear the chef was missing a step.
Oh come on, a sub isn\'t a sandwich?! Fine, have it your way.
Oh really? I always took you for someone who enjoyed a good wiener.
Yes, the dessert taco does seem like a bit of a stretch
If you had tried to get cute, that knuckle sandwich would have been for you
I take it you more of a structural purist. Small minds fear ew ideas.
I get it; you\'re a two pieces of bread kind of person.
Had you clicked yes, I would have alerted authorities and had you committed.
Personally, I love to eat cat. But maybe I\'m a pervert.
Your answers have been inconsistent. Restarting tutorial
Congratulations, you have trained me well. Let\'s eat!
